project.name: market-enabler
project.description:
Market-Enabler is an application to fake the phone's location and access markets from other countries. Android market is separated into regions (country and carrier specific) and some apps are just enabled for a specific country and not available to the other countries.
MarketEnabler is based on reverse engineering of Market delivered up to 1.5.x but does work with final 1.6 Market.
This App was developed by '''Andrea Baccega''' for The Italian resource About Android..
Version 3 is under development by '''Andrea Baccega''' and '''rac''' but needs more time due to heavy load from other Projects with higher priority.
A non final compatibility list can be found here.
Donations
Donations to the developers are welcome and can be done trough Pay Pal
